name: Virgin Remy Peruvian Human Hair Weft
description:
You can now purchase 100% Peruvian human hair wefts from MyLuxury1st!  All hair is 100% New and Remy; which means all cuticles are aligned the same way.  This hair is single drawn.  There is little to no grey hair, shedding, or tangles.  This hair is Top Grade, Unprocessed, and imported.  Ships within 6-10 business days Free to the USA.

You may choose naturally straight or body wave.  The color will be around a #1b darkest brown.  Try it for yourself.  How you take care of your hair will determine how long it will last.  Usually it last 6m to a year in most cases.  It can be dyed any color. [You should strand test it.] 

Each bundle is 100g or 3.5oz in weight.  Please ask your stylist how many bundles or how you should layer your wefts.

Prices & Lengths:

10" $65.00
12" $70.00
14" $75.00
16" $83.00
18" $91.00
20" $97.00
22" $105.00
24" $110.00
26" $115.00
28" $120.00
30" $125.00

name: MyLuxury1st Brazilian Body Wave Hair Weft Bundles
description:
100% Remy human hair.  Brazilian Origin. Medium Body wave.  Not too deep, but not too loose.  Natural Dark Brown color.
[If purchasing more than 1 bundle, each bundle slightly vary in color.  This is because each bundle is fresh, unprocessed, and comes from different donors]
There should be small amount of gray hair.  This is normal.  Very little shedding. As this is normal too.  Like with any hair.  You can seal the weft to decrease this chance.  The hair is at length once stretched.  Wavy hair always appears shorter, but you will be able to measure it.  This can be dyed, washed, & conditioned.  Make sure to use a quality or mild shampoo.  Sulfate frees work best.  Moisturizing conditioners too.  This hair can last awhile depending on how you manage it.  Use a heat protector.  You can trim this hair if you want also.
You should change your weave at least every 6-8 weeks.  It is not your own hair, so it needs care & maintenance.  Argan oil can be used to maintain the ends if needed.  
Suitable for women of all ethnicity.  The longer the hair in length, the shorter the width.  Each bundle is 100 grams which is about 3.5 oz.  Ask your stylist how many bundles you will need.  
Hand sewn.  Usually ships within 6-10 business days.
The shortest is 10" @ $69.00
The longest is 30" @ $129.00
Free Shipping to the USA  Any questions, please contact me.

name: MYLUXURY1ST OMBRE DIP DYED HAIR EXTENSIONS
description:
Dip dyed, Ombre 100% Remy Human Hair Extensions

This type of hair style is when the top part of the hair fades halfway down the middle to a different color towards the bottom.  These are dip and dyed to achieve the look.

** 3 Colors to choose from ***
4/613 Medium Brown/Bleach Blonde
2/27 Chocolate Brown/Strawberry Blonde
613/Red Bleach Blonde/Red

Choose Your Set:
100 STRANDS 20" NAIL U TIP HAIR 50 GRAMS
100 STRANDS 20" STICK I TIP HAIR 50 GRAMS
8 PIECES 20" CLIP IN HAIR Extensions 100 GRAMS
20 PIECES 26" REMY TAPE IN HAIR Extensions 70 GRAMS

You may also choose 40 pieces 25"-26" Remy Tape in hair extensions
140 grams weight.  Automatically save $11.00!
*The hair comes this long so you are able to trim or cut to your liking.  Also you get 70 grams per 20 pieces when all others sell 50g per 20 pieces.  What a bargain!

name: Weft Human Hair
description: The popular 22" long, 12" wide human hair weft. Colors available are: Jet Black Chocolate Brown Medium Brown Strawberry Blonde Bleach Blonde Each weft, is a 22" long in length, and 12" wide in width. Please use your measuring tape to get an idea. These are not enough for a full head, as they are only 12" wide [like a ruler] & 30 grams in weight. Most women use these as peekaboos, or fill ins, or high/low lites. These can be glued in, or sewn in, or you can add your own clips or make your own fusion tips. [For Example] 100% Natural human hair. For wider weft; about 45" wide, 22" long, 100 grams Regular human hair; the colors available are: Jet Black Chocolate Brown Medium Brown Ash Brown Ash Brown/Bleach Blonde side by side blend Bleach Blonde For wider weft; about 45" wide, 20" long, 100 grams Regular human hair; the colors available are: Jet Black Chocolate Brown Medium Brown Ash Brown Chestnut Brown Dark Golden Brown Dark Golden Brown/Bleach Blonde #12/613 Chocolate Brown/Bleach Blonde #2/613 Ash Brown/Bleach Blonde #6/613 Bleach Blonde Or try the Remy Human hair weft: For wider weft; about 45" wide, 22" long, 100 grams Remi human hair; the colors available are: Jet Black Chocolate Brown Medium Brown Ash Brown Ash Blonde Platinum Blonde [slight white tint] Bleach Blonde [slight yellow tint] Ash Brown/Bleach Blonde Out of the choices above, you can also customize the width, just make sure to message me and let me know how wide you need the pieces for a price quote.

name: MYLUXURY1ST 100 Strand by Strands Remy Micro Bead Easy Loop
description: You will receive 100 single strands [A 50 GRAM SET] -The bead and loop will be attached for you. You will just need a tool to clamp the micro bead shut. -Ask your stylist how many strands or grams you may need for your style. Each 20" strand is 0.5g per strand. -The hair can be curled, flat ironed, washed, conditioned, & dyed darker -100% Remy Human Hair, re-useable and adjustable Colors to choose from are: #1 Jet Black Off Black very very dark brown #2 Chocolate Brown #4 Medium Brown [lighter than #2] #8 Chestnut Brown #12 Light Golden Brown #12b Dark Golden Brown #22 Golden Blonde #27 Strawberry Blonde #60 Platinum Blonde [white tint] #613 Bleach Blonde [yellow tint] Purple Blue Red Pink Burgundy Quality is Silky, straight, smooth, Asian Remy Indian processed hair. 100% hand made, usually ships within 6-10 business days If you need help with colors or want to inquire about other lengths or weight, use the CONTACT form at the top of this page or email: Denyce@Hairdresser.net 16", 0.4 GRAMS PER STRAND @100strands 18", 0.5 GRAMS PER STRAND @100strands COLORS: Jet Black Off Black Chocolate Brown Medium Brown Ash Brown Chestnut Brown Dark Golden Brown Ash Blonde Dark Blonde [strawberry tint] Bleach Blonde Other inches listed below with colors available are: 16", 18", 20", 22", 24", 26" COLOR SWATCH: VIDEO DEMO: There is a string at the top in the loop and a micro ring I have already attached for you. All you have to do now is put your hair through the loop and pull at the string. It automatically pulls the hair through the micro ring. Then, just clamp the bead ring shut; and you're done. You can adjust the length as your hair grows; just use a plier to open the micro ring and push the extension back up towards your scalp; then re-clamp the micro ring shut. TO REMOVE, all you have to do is to open the bead ring and slide it off. You should get MyLuxury1st Micro Loop hair extensions to add glamor, body, length, volume or highlights. Micro bead [loop rings] should not be applied to oily or conditioned hair root; or they may slip out. It is normal to lose a few extensions per month; these are re-usable so keep the strands if you plan on getting your hair redone. *Proper care and maintenance is required for all hair extension methods in order for them to last. *You should use a sulfate free Shampoo & Moisturizing Conditioner [which is located in this shop] or your favorite quality brand for washing & co-washing. Sulfate frees won't strip your hair; which will make the extensions last longer. You can use gentle shampoos like baby shampoo as well. With extensions, you do not need to wash your hair every day. Some customers use a dry shampoo in between. This is up to you. *Don't bunch the hair up while washing. Wash the extensions from the top down while gently working the shampoo into the strands. Rinse thoroughly with clean water, again working from the top down. *Apply a quality conditioner, but avoid adding too much. Too much can cause build up that can lead to tangles. Wrap your hair in a towel and gently press the excess water out. *Comb through with wide tooth comb and let them air dry. This hair may have a natural crimp to it after wash, just re-straighten or wear as is. When using heat, always use a heat protector. Remember, this hair is not coming from your scalp, so you need to take care of it. You can use the Argan oil that is in this shop on your hair & ends to keep them nice [not the root], or your favorite quality hair serum. © Denyce of MyLuxury1st 2013 All Rights Reserved No part of this website or any of its contents may be reproduced, copied, or modified without crediting to http://www.MyLuxury1st.com

name: 20" MYLUXURY1ST 20 Pieces Remy Tape Weft Body Wavy 50 grams
description: Regular Price You will receive 20 single pieces [A 50 GRAM SET] -These need to be heated to seal. Use a flat or curling iron to sandwich two pieces so the adhesive can heat and stick. 3-5 seconds should be enough; opening the tool to release heat as not to over melt. When warm press FIRMLY with fingers along the entire length to make sure each piece is stuck together. -To apply Tape hair extensions you section your hair into a straight line. *Remove the backing tape from a piece of Tape Hair, and place it under a small section of your natural hair near the scalp. Make sure to only use a thin section of your own hair. You should be able to see the tape through your own hair. This ensures that the tape hair can stick to itself to help hold. Using too much of your own hair will not let the tape hair stick to itself and it will come out easily. A full head may need 40 pcs or 60 pcs for thicker hair This hair can be curled, flat ironed, washed, conditioned, & dyed darker. -Ask your stylist for help if needed; customer is responsible for install and aftercare. 20" long, 1.5" wide per piece -100% Remy Human Hair 7 Colors to choose from are: #1 Jet Black #2 Chocolate Brown #4 Medium Brown [tad lighter than #2] #6 Ash Brown [vibrant #4] #60 Platinum Blonde [white tint] #613 Bleach Blonde [yellow tint] #16/613 Ash Blonde/Bleach Blonde Quality is Silky, smooth, Asian Remy Indian processed hair 100% hand made, usually ships within 6-10 business days If you need help with colors; use the CONTACT form at the top of this page or email: Denyce@Hairdresser.net *Before you apply tape hair extensions, make sure your own hair is clean and free of any oils. Do not condition your hair before applying. Blow dry your hair completely, so that your scalp does not contain any additional moisture. *DO NOT APPLY TO OILED OR CONDITIONED HAIR ROOT. **DO NOT WASH FOR 3 DAYS AFTER. This type of extension is semi-permanent & usually last anywhere from 4-6 weeks, with 8 weeks for most customers depending on how fast your hair grows and how you are maintaining it. You can always replace by adding more tape. Video Testimony: HERE'S A TUTORIAL BY CUSTOMER/FRIEND; MAKE-UP & HAIR STYLIST: CHELSEA! https://www.facebook.com/AllDolledUpByChelsea
